physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Evidence of specific IgE antibodies to wheat, barley and rye flour allergens. FEV1 was 87% of predictive value.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient reported an improvement in symptoms after the successful removal of a carcinoid tumor.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient had recurrent acute episodes of generalized urticaria after ingestion of cola drinks. The skin prick tests were negative for the cola and cereal flour.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient developed urticaria within 10 minutes after ingestion of a cola drink during oral challenges.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: IgE antibodies detected for linseed (flax) with a reaction causing anaphylaxis upon ingestion.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After identification of sensitivity, the patient avoided linseed thereafter.
